text: Bernard Longley (born 5 April 1955) is an English prelate of the Roman Catholic Church. He was named the Archbishop of Birmingham on 1 October 2009, and installed on 8 December 2009. Bishop Bernard Longley was born in Manchester, and went to New College, Oxford. He was ordained Bishop and appointed as an Auxiliary Bishop of the Diocese of Westminster on 24 January 2003. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:English Roman Catholic archbishops
title: Bernard Longley
